title: Minecraft 基岩版 1.2.3 build 1 发布
author: Mithey
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Mithey 于 2017-10-5 10:50 编辑 
测试版是Minecraft PE版的测试机制，主要用于下一个正式版的特性预览。 然而，测试版主要用于新特性展示，通常存在大量漏洞。因此对于普通玩家建议仅做测试尝鲜用。使用测试版打开存档前请务必备份。 适用于正式版的领域服务器不兼容，不提供支持。 Minecraft PE 1.2.3 正式版 仍未发布， build 1 为其第 1 个测试版 转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。  Bug Fixes:
Bug修复
Fixed a crash that occurred when loading world chunks修复了在加载区块时导致游戏崩溃的BUGFixed a crash that occurred when using the crafting screen修复了使用工作台时导致游戏崩溃的BUGFixed a crash that occurred when going through a Nether portal and then using a piston修复了通过地狱门后使用活塞导致游戏崩溃的BUGFixed a crash that occurred with Iron Golems on converted worlds修复了铁傀儡在转换世界时导致游戏崩溃的BUGFixed a crash that occurred when using the '/fill' command that caused to many spawned entities to fall修复在使用"/fill"指令时由于过多的实体导致游戏崩溃的BUGFixed an exploit that allowed child accounts to join servers when multiplayer permissions were disabled修复了儿童用户在多人游戏中没有权限的BUGThe 'Inception' achievement in now unlockable on all platforms成就"开始"现在可以在所有平台中解锁Fixed an exploit that caused rails to be duplicated修复了铁轨的BUGFixed an exploit that caused Shulker boxes to be duplicated when broken by an explosion修复了潜影盒被爆炸时会多出一个的BUGFire Resistance effect will now properly protect players after quitting and rejoining a world在玩家离开或重新加入一个世界时，防火效果能确实保护其Players can no longer be targeted by mobs before loading into a world or dimension玩家在加载世界完成前不能成为怪物的目标Fixed an issue causing transparency issues on several skins修复皮肤透明度的问题Pressing the A button no longer cancels Elytra flight and will now make the player ascend按下一个按钮不再取消鞘翅飞行，现在会将玩家提升Players will no longer cease climbing stairs and slabs while flying玩家现在可以一边飞行一边爬楼梯了Fixed Iron Golems not causing enough Knockback effect修复了铁傀儡的击退效果Servers will no longer briefly appear on the Friends tab服务器将不再短暂地出现在好友标题
Heavy blocks no longer break when falling on leaf blocks重的方块落在树叶上不会破坏掉它了Fixed the texture offset of Mooshroom's udder layer修复了哞菇的材质Sheep no longer emit two sounds when dying羊死的时候不会叫两声了Items renamed in an anvil that have been placed will now retain their names after being mined在铁砧里面改名的物品被挖了之后会保持它的名字Fixed Guardians not spawning in Ocean Monuments修复了守卫者生成错误的BUGLeaves that have snow over them will no longer appear black有雪在叶子上将不显示黑色Fixed an issue that could cause chat to freeze if there was a high amount of chat output修复了如果有大量的聊天输出造成聊天冻结
Skulls can now be placed on the ground when a layer of snow is already there骷髅可以被放在有楼梯和雪的地上Doors, Wooden Buttons, Ladders and Fishing Rods can now be used as fuel in a Furnace门，木按钮，楼梯和钓鱼竿可以被用作燃料Fixed some vines being destroyed when pressing right-click修复了有些植物会在按右键时被破坏的BUGFixed an incorrect controller tooltip when moving an item in the Creative inventory over the hotbar修复了在创造模式中移动快捷栏的物品到背包产生错误提示的BUGSpider and Endermen eye are now slightly visible when hit with invisibility potions蜘蛛和末影人在隐身时，可以看到他们的眼睛Fixed no sound when filling a bottle with Dragon's Breath修复了装龙息时没声音的BUG"Elytra Wings" are now referred to simply as "Elytra"“鞘翅的翅膀”现在被简称为“鞘翅”Players with Fire Resistance will now receive damage from lightning火焰保护可以抵御雷电伤害Fixed a constant green highlight on the inventory screen of tamable mobs修复了驯服动物导致屏幕不断闪烁绿光的BUGPumpkins and mob heads can now be equipped directly from the Creative inventory on Pocket UI手机版可以在创造模式中装备怪物头颅和南瓜了Increased the distance that the Enchantment Table book will open when a player approaches it增加玩家靠近附魔台时,打开附魔台上面书的距离Runes no longer float from bookshelves to the Enchantment Table at the same time符文不会在书架和附魔台上同时显示了Fixed graphical issues with the experience bar when the Candy Texture Pack is applied修复了试用糖果材质包时经验值异常的BUGBanners will now wave when daylight cycle is disabled旗帜会在停止日夜循环时飘扬了Items replaced by a command are now visible instantly in the inventory用指令替换的物品可以在背包中看见了The "Choose Skin" text no longer flickers on the Skin Picker (Android only)“选择皮肤“文本不再闪烁在Skin Picker（仅限Android）Adding a 'damage_sensor' to an entity type no longer prevents '/kill' from working                添加一个“damage_sensor”实体类型，不再阻止/kill”指令工作
 正版地址谷歌正版https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mojang.minecraftpe测试组https://play.google.com/apps/testing/com.mojang.minecraftpePE官方博客https://feedback.minecraft.net/
